      • getTriangleInequalityAssumptionBreach

        public double getTriangleInequalityAssumptionBreach(float[][] distMat)
        Parameters:
        distMat - The distance matrix.
        Returns:
        The percentage of triangles not satisfying the triangle inequality.

      • goodmanKruskalIndex

        public float goodmanKruskalIndex(float[][] distMat,
                        DataSet dset)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        It calculates an index which measures how concordant are the distances with respect to data classes. Standardized categories are assumed. The index takes a value betwen -1 and 1.
        Parameters:
        distMat - distance matrix
        dset - DataSet
        Returns:
        GoodmanKruskalIndex = (Nc - Nd) / (Nc + Nd), Nc - concordant, Nd - discordant distances
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
